select u.user_id, u.user_account, u.user_name, u.user_nike, u.user_img, u.user_phone, u.create_time, u.update_time, temp.count as give_count from weiit_user u left join ( select cu.user_id, count(1) as count, c.max_limit from weiit_ump_coupon_user cu join weiit_ump_coupon c on cu.coupon_id=c.coupon_id where cu.coupon_id=#{validate_id} group by cu.user_id ) temp on u.user_id=temp.user_id where (temp.count is null or (temp.count is not null and temp.count < temp.max_limit) or (temp.count is not null and temp.max_limit is null))
and u.user_account like concat('%', #{user_account}, '%')
and u.user_name like concat('%', #{user_name}, '%')
and u.user_phone like concat('%', #{user_phone}, '%')
and u.shop_id=#{shop_id}
order by u.create_time desc
